column4: hi all i just installed kde on ubuntu server, how do i make it start the gui on a reboot?
i looked for the /etc/inittab, but could not find it
then xinit, and startx launches the gui
it was kind of nice, didnt know it had that much of functionlaity
why you want kde don't you ...I don't see the point otherwise , it's only abit larger. you always remove plasma if you want
why did you say that webmin is dangerous?
i have not installed the copiz
in the terminal , sudo dpkg --configure -a , the try updating again
what is the purpose of the command   sudo dpkg --configure -a
sudo dpkg --configure -a      what is the impact of this command
that command finishes any pending updates
